'''Ivy Boffin, n√©e Goodenough''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Ivy was the wife of [[Buffo Boffin]] and mother of [[Bosco Boffin|Bosco]] ({{SR|1167}}-{{SR|1258}}), [[Basso Boffin|Basso]] (born {{SR|1169}}), [[Briffo Boffin|Briffo]] (born {{SR|1170}}), and [[Berylla Baggins|Berylla]] (born {{SR|1172}}).<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
